Math

Contains subroutines to assist in certain mathematical calculations

Functions
CalculateMidpoint
call Math.CalculateMidpoint(
point1,
point2,
&center
);

Find the center between two points.

Parameters
point1

The first point

point2

The second point

Response Parameters
&center

the midpoint between point1 and point2

TransformPoint
call Math.TransformPoint(
p0x,
p0y,
angleInDegrees,
&px,
&py
);

Rotate a point a given number of degrees and return the new position

Parameters
p0x

starting X position

p0y

starting Y position

angleInDegrees

magnitude (in degrees) of rotation

Response Parameters
&px

ending X position

&py

ending Y position
